page.title: 10The Milk Marketing Board
page.content:
{ }My Dad works at the milk marketing board. He phones the milk board for some calls to farms to do with the cows. Then after he has finished the calls he phones up for some more so he can do those. Then he comes home for lunch. In the afternoon he goes back to the milk board to put the flask back. Then in the morninghe will go back to the milk boardto ask if there are any more calls. Andrea Kearton
Mr and Mrs Spencer do the milk delivery inWrentham. They live at 9 Bonsey Gardens. The milk is fresh from the Milk Marketing Board. They start at about half past six. Sometimes Mrs Spencer helps. Heidi Hodgkins
